A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The wrtting was terrible. Luke's story was very week. He came off as a weak and creepy old man hovering over Ray at certain points. They spent half the movie chasing a \" code breaker\"  that was a gigantic waste of time and a distraction from the important characters and their development.  I'm OK with the new direction for the series but at least close things in a coherent way for the narratives that have been present throughout the series.
